resources.string: Hello Everyone, I\'m Gaurav Patel and this is my android Lab 3.
Terminology Button: Talks about concepts implemented in this app and gives brief description about it.
Websites Button: Redirects you to google website.

Name: Gaurav Patel
Program: Computer Programming Analysis
College: Seneca College
Hay you opened up terminology page on foreground.

string-array.name: def
string-array.item: - adb allows us to connect/interact or go in to our AVD. Commands such as "adb shell"
- Using the emulator command, we can run the AVD through command line.
- We used android list avd to list our android virtual devices.
